description: System-generated unique identifier for this procedure status change event.
Timestamp when the status change was recorded in the system.
Identifier of the user who performed the status change.
Identifier of the procedure/work item whose status was changed (e.g., maintenance or inspection task).
Denormalized reference to a static lookup of the procedure at change time; likely for reporting consistency; confirm with SME.
Snapshot description of the procedure from a static lookup captured at change time; likely for reporting; confirm with SME.
Code representing the procedure’s status after the change; maps to a status lookup.
Denormalized lookup key for the new status captured at change time; used for historical reporting; confirm with SME.
Snapshot description of the new status from a static lookup at change time; confirm with SME.
Code representing the procedure’s status before the change; maps to a status lookup.
Denormalized lookup key for the prior status at change time; confirm with SME.
Snapshot description of the prior status from a static lookup; confirm with SME.
Timestamp when this status change record was last updated in the database.
Timestamp of the last user-driven modification to this record; appears redundant with last_modified—confirm with SME.
User ID that originally created this status change record.
Timestamp when this status change record was created.
User ID that most recently modified this status change record.
Timestamp when this status change record was most recently modified.
